rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a small foyer that leads into the central living area.
Open-plan kitchen and living/dining area designed in Chettinad style with intricate detailing and vibrant colors. Integrated cooking station.
Spacious bedroom with a private balcony offering views of the courtyard, aligning with Vastu principles for energy flow.
Second bedroom featuring a generous balcony adjoining a quiet section of the central courtyard.
Functional bathroom integrated within the living space for efficient usage.

openings.description: Large balcony extending over the central courtyard with privacy screens and ample seating.
Balcony designed for relaxation, overlooking greenery within the courtyard.
